title: Power-cut durations extended tomorrow
content: Durations of daily power-cuts will be extended tomorrow (28) as per approval given by the Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka.With fuel not available, the Ceylon Electricity Boardâ€™s request for a supply disruption of five hours and 15 minutes has been approved for areas under the P, Q, R, S, T, U, V and W groups.For A, B and C groups, it will be for four hours and 40 minutes.
